column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////When we visited Chicago from Kentucky
column2: I just KNEW I had to eat at Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!  It's located in a really cute neighborhood and the restaurant itself is a lot of fun.  We tried a variety of things:  cheeses
column9: and other deliciousness.  My favorite was the coconut flan (OMG
column10: can I PLEASE have this recipe?) and the sangria!  I took off one star because I think it's really expensive to make a full meal here
column11: but I would come for a snack and drinks the next time we find ourselves in Chicago.
